revised_title: Discovery of the Iguanodon: A Fossil Reptile from Tilgate Forest, Sussex
tldr: The author, Gideon Mantell, discovers a new fossil reptile, the Iguanodon, in the sandstone of Tilgate Forest, Sussex. The teeth of this herbivorous reptile are distinct from other known reptiles and are compared to those of the recent iguana. The Iguanodon's teeth and some bones found in the sandstone are similar to those of the crocodile, megalosaurus, and plesiosaurus, suggesting that they may have inhabited rivers or freshwater lakes.
